name: twitter-following-tab-extension
description: Browser extension that automatically selects the Following tab when navigating to X.com, skipping the default For You timeline

scripts.build:prod: npm run copy-files && npm run zip
scripts.copy-files: mkdir -p dist && cp manifest.json content-script.js dist/ && cp -r icons dist/ 2>/dev/null || true && cp -r popup dist/ 2>/dev/null || true
scripts.dev: npm run build && npm run watch
scripts.watch: echo 'Watching for changes...' && npm run copy-files && fswatch -o manifest.json content-script.js popup/ icons/ | xargs -n1 -I{} npm run copy-files
scripts.lint: echo 'Linting JavaScript files...' && jshint content-script.js || echo 'Install jshint globally: npm install -g jshint'
scripts.test-load: echo 'To test the extension:' && echo '1. Open Chrome and go to chrome://extensions/' && echo '2. Enable Developer mode' && echo '3. Click "Load unpacked" and select the dist/ folder' && echo '4. Navigate to x.com to test the functionality'
